wiki.content: The song was written by the Canadian rapper Drake, but according to the R.I.P. Songfacts he originally intended to give it to Rihanna rather than Rita Ora. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The song was written by the Canadian rapper Drake, but according to the R.I.P. Songfacts he originally intended to give it to Rihanna rather than Rita Ora.

track.name: R.I.P. (feat. Tinie Tempah)
